```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

library(dplyr)
library(tidyr)
library(keyring)
library(RPostgreSQL)

kb <- keyring_unlock("work_keys")
kb$keyring_set_default("work_keys")

drv <- dbDriver("PostgreSQL")
conn <- dbConnect(drv, dbname = "portals",
                 host = host, port = port,
                 user = user, password = kb$get("portaldb"))

```

```{r}
incidents_insert <- readRDS("data/incidents_upload.rds")

dbWriteTable(conn = conn, name = "temp_incidents_uploads", value = upload_id, overwrite = T)
```
